channel.title: Almost great
channel.description:
well guys ide be like a uber source coder if i learned 3 things,1.how do i add items to the source like customs and stuff and add stats. 2.how do i move objects? 3.how do i change teleport locations.
please reply with screen shots and tut links please

item.title: Almost great
item.dc:creator: @jose3121 jose3121
item.description:
@jose3121 wrote:

this is very easy if you tried looking. Number 3 just tele to a place in your magic book get a java z file searcher(mostly in 508 clients and 525 clients or sources) and when you tele to the spot do ::mypos. Number 2 you can move objects through make global object and delete global object or something like that just delete the object and add it to make global object and number one you can easily find it through the search thingy.

Read full topic
